Tested cards include.. *'''Toshiba''' (PA3489U-1MPC, G86C0001U910, V000060830) - 8086:4222 (8086:1040), :OUI: 00:13:02, FCC ID: CJ6UPA3489WL, IC ID: 248H-DPA3489W *Unknown - 8086:4222 (8086:1050), OUT 00:13:02 *Unknown - 8086:4222 (8086:1000), OUI: 00:18:DE *'''Dell 0NC293''' - 8086:4222 (8086:1020), OUI: 00:18:DE, 00:1C:BF, :FCC ID: E2KWM3945ABG, IC ID: 1514B-3945ABG *'''Lenovo ThinkPad T60''' ID - 8086:4227 (8086:1010), OUI 00:13:02 *'''Lenovo ThinkPad R60''' 9461-DXG - 8086:4227 (8086:1011), OUI: 00:18:DE :Output of ''sudo lspci -vvnnq -d 8086:4227'' [http://pastebin.com/EzRZxhqX here], or [https://cloud.openmailbox.org/public.php?service=files&t=a19b419c64682a960dc7c23b7017bc90&download here]. *'''Lenovo ThinkPad R60e''' 0657-4MU: **Model: WM3945ABG MOW1 **FRU: 42T0853 **(ASM?) PN: 42T0852 **EC: L02374 **FCC ID: PD9LEN3945ABG **PCI Subsystem ID: 8086:1010 **IEEE 802.11 A/B/G OUI: 00:18:DE HP SPS: 451861-001 451861-002 451861-003 451861-004 ==Links of Interest== [http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/Intel_PRO/Wireless_3945ABG_Mini-PCI_Express_Adapter Lenovo cards on ThinkWiki] ==Pictures==
